description: Try our easy to follow Whole Turkey With Orange, Macadamia & Honey Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Whole Turkey With Orange, Macadamia & Honey Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup flatleaf parsley leaves, roughly chopped
1 large orange, rind finely grated, juiced
1 cup macadamia nuts, roasted, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Heat butter and oil in a frying pan over medium heat. When melted, add onion and bacon and cook for 10 minutes or until softened. Transfer to a large bowl and cool. Add breadcrumbs, nuts, orange rind, orange juice, dried herbs, parsley, egg and 2 tbs honey. Season and stir until well combined.

Fill front and back cavity of turkey with stuffing. Tuck wings under turkey and secure legs with kitchen twine. Place turkey into a large roasting pan and rub with oil. Roast for 3 hours. If turkey should begin to colour too much, cover loosely with large sheets of foil. Remove foil. Pour melted honey into a small bowl, add 2 tbs butter and stir until combined. Brush mixture liberally over turkey. Roast for a further 30 minutes or until cooked through. If turkey should brown too much, cover loosely with foil. Transfer turkey to a large serving platter. Serve with vegetables of choice.
